name: Gazpacho rojo

ingredients: Tomatoes (either 1 kg of ripe tomatoes or 660 g of passata)
100 ml olive oil (the higher the quality, the better)
150 g of white bread (without crust. I use sandwich bread)

instructions: - Wash well the vegetables. Peel the garlic and cucumber. Roughly cut this one together with the tomatoes and pepper. Also split the bread in smaller bits.

- Blend everything well, adding water to correct for consistency. Should be somewhere between a soup and a pure√®. If you used tomatoes instead of passata, now strain it to remove bits of skin and seeds.
- Put in the fridge and serve when cold (though I do like it when made in the moment)
